Title: Beyond Re-Animator
Writer: Xavier Berraondo (script collaborator), José Manuel Gómez (screenplay), H.P. Lovecraft (characters), Miguel Tejada-Flores (story)
Actors: Jeffrey Combs, Tommy Dean Musset, Jason Barry, Bárbara Elorrieta
Plot: After 13 years in prison, the mad scientist from Re-Animator (1985) gets a new chance to experiment with the arrival of a young prison doctor, who secretly hopes to learn to reanimate dead people. Good intentions turn to horror.
